creator: lmpmbernardo@gmail.com
text:
Created attachment 28796
test FO file for the sake of completeness...

The command "fop sample.fo -print" when run on a Mac OS X sends the document to the printer but the page comes blank.

However, "fop sample.fo sample.pdf" followed by "lpr sample.pdf" works, so the issue is not the printer.
*** Bug 54042 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
creator: lmpmbernardo@gmail.com
lmpmbernardo@gmail.com
text: this is not reproducible in trunk anymore but it does happen with FOP-1.1. closing the issue until there is further reason to reopen it.
